{{Wired embedded system |brand=ChipPC |model=Xtreme PC LXD8941 |upc=818391003834 |serialnum_prefix=CSN- |asin=B00H9OVM9S |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=06/2013 |type=thin client |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88AP510 |cpu1_cspeed=933 |fla1=2 GiB |fla1_brand=SanDisk |fla1_model=SDIN5D1-2G |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L1606EM2I-12G |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63BFR-H9C |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=6 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Flash-Based, 8-Bit CMOS Microcontrollers;Microchip;PIC16F1937;;1;,,, I2S Audio Codec, 1.3W Class AB/D Mono Amplifier;Realtek;ALC5621;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;2;,,, DVI Transmitter;Silicon Image;Sil164CTG64;;1;,,, Single-Chip HDMI Transmitter Port Protection;TI;TPD12S521;;1;,,, 7-Channel Integrated ESD Solution for VGA Port;TI;TPD7S019;;1;,,, 12V, 4.5A, 500kHz Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PH845;;7;,,, 30V, 35A P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AON7401;;1;,,, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8226;;1;,,, |flags=Micro SD Card slot, DVI-I, Audio out (3.5mm), Audio in (3.5mm), power switch |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.08; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32.9;dove-5.4.2; |oui_eth=00:05:35 }} {{TagLine|High Performance Thin Client}} :[http://portal.chippc.com/support/downloads/files/LXD8941_Spec.pdf Data sheet]
"CPC06102" silkscreened on board top
===Links=== *[https://forum.doozan.com/read.php?2,67954 ''Debian on Chip PC LXD8941'' on '''Linux Device Hacking''' Forum]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88AP510 @933MHz ARM v7 (PJ4 core) *GPU: ''Vivante GC600'' (OpenGL 3.0/ES 2.0, OpenVG) *Storage: TF card (max. 64GB) / MMC card slot / :2GB (eMMC 4.41) Flash, 2MB NOR Flash *Memory: [[Hynix]] 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 6x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V/1.5A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:ChipPC Xtreme PC LXD8941 Top.jpeg|Board top File:ChipPC Xtreme PC LXD8941 Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
